entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes Why haven’t you left the WH, you told people that the coronavirus isn’t dangerous. So you can go out and play golf, and kiss on all of your mistress. Because you can just drink some bleach. And stand under ultraviolet light.
